world.physics.collision

Class BorderCollision

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.physics.collision.Collision
      • world.physics.collision.BorderCollision

  • public final class BorderCollision
extends Collision
    A class of border collisions extending collisions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Border collisionBorder
      A variable registering the border with which the entity of this border collision collides.
      private Entity collisionEntity
      The entity colliding with a world border.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorderCollision

        public BorderCollision(World world,
               Entity entity)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes this border collision with a given world and a given colliding entity.
        Parameters:
        world - The given world.
        entity - The given colliding entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given world is not a valid world for this collision | !canHaveAsWorld(world)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given entity is not a valid a collision entity for this collision. | !canHaveAsCollisionEntity(entity)

      • canHaveAsCollisionBorder

        protected static boolean canHaveAsCollisionBorder(Border collisionBorder)
        Checks whether the given collision border is a valid border to collide with.
        Parameters:
        collisionBorder - The given collision border.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given collision border is not null. | result == collisionBorder != null

      • getTimeToBorderCollision

        private double getTimeToBorderCollision(Border border)
        Gets the time it takes the collision to collide with a given border.
        Parameters:
        border - The given border.
        Returns:
        The time it takes the collision to collide with a given border. | time to collision = time for the position vector of the entity to reach a point at distance r from the border
